title: A conference between a Bensalian bishop and an English doctor, concerning church-government shewing the difference betwixt that of Bensalia and the Church of England : together with a letter from the Bishop of Bensalia to the Archbishop of Canterbury in order to the healing of our church-differences ...
author: Do-Well, Theophilus.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed for Tho. Parkhurst and Joseph Collier ...,
